description: Rage Software used the XFS format in various games during the late 1990s and early 2000s until the company went defunct. While games no longer use the format, you may still encounter it in the installation directory of old Rage Software games like eRacer and Rage Rally.
For example, you can find XFS files in the "Cars" and "Tracks" folders in the following directory for the eRacer installation:
NOTE: Rage Software was formerly Rage Games.
